name: ngx-admin-cypress
description: This repo will contain Cypress tests used in Cypress course on Udemy from Artem Bondar Academy. I'll be adding more tests in the future just for practice. The tests in this repo are to be used with with NGX-Admin which is in _ngx-admin_ repo.

scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json -o mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.delete:reports: del cypress\results\junit\* /f /q && del mochawesome-report\* /f /q && del cypress\results\mochawesome\* /f /q || exit 0
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run prereport && npm run cypress:run && npm run junit:merge && npm run mochawesome:merge

author: Federico Pantaleone
